synonyms.synonym: Ubiquinol-cytochrome c reductase complex 7.2 kDa protein

protein.specific_function: This is a component of the ubiquinol-cytochrome c reductase complex (complex III or cytochrome b-c1 complex), which is part of the mitochondrial respiratory chain. This subunit interacts with cytochrome c1

go_class.description: monovalent inorganic cation transmembrane transporter activity
generation of precursor metabolites and energy
mitochondrial electron transport, ubiquinol to cytochrome c

Genome Res. 2000 Oct;10(10):1546-60.
